### Dyadic Interaction Dynamics
This Shiny app allows users to simulate and visualize data from the dyadic interaction dynamic models that are discussed in the paper 'A Tool to Simulate and Visualize Dyadic Interaction Dynamics' by S.W. Berkhout, N.K. Schuurman, and E.L. Hamaker (preprint). The source code can be found on <a href="https://github.com/sophieberkhout/dyadic-interaction-dynamics" target="_blank">GitHub</a>.

#### Contact information
If you have any questions or comments, please contact S.W. Berkhout ([s.w.berkhout@uu.nl](mailto:s.w.berkhout@uu.nl)).
